mapper.sql: a.office_id AS "customer.id", a.pay_pwd AS "payPwd", a.level AS "level", a.credit AS "credit", a.wallet AS "wallet", a.money AS "money", a.ali_account AS "aliAccount", a.ali_name AS "aliName", a.status AS "delFlag", a.create_id AS "createBy.id", a.create_time AS "createDate", a.u_version AS "uVersion", a.update_id AS "updateBy.id", a.update_time AS "updateDate", so.name AS "customer.name", su.name as "updateBy.name", su.name as "createBy.name", suso.mobile as "customer.moblieMoeny.mobile"
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO biz_cust_credit( office_id, pay_pwd, `level`, credit, wallet, money,
ali_account,
ali_name,
status, create_id, create_time, u_version, update_id, update_time ) VALUES ( #{customer.id}, #{payPwd}, #{level}, #{credit}, #{wallet}, #{money},
#{aliAccount},
#{aliName},
#{delFlag}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{uVersion}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate} )
mapper.update:
UPDATE biz_cust_credit SET office_id = #{customer.id}, pay_pwd = #{payPwd},
`level` = #{level},
credit = #{credit}, wallet = #{wallet}, money = #{money},
ali_account = #{aliAccount},
ali_name = #{aliName},
u_version = #{uVersion}, update_id = #{updateBy.id}, update_time = #{updateDate} WHERE office_id = #{id}
